attributes.action: Reintroduce Mortgage interest tax relief on all Mortgages up to the first £250.000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will aid all types of buyers both first time and existing owners.............because its not the bankers that need the money its the buyers and owners it is then easier to pay the bills thus removing the pressure from them enabling them to pay the bills and hence the reduced knock on effect give the money to the people not the banks
